issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h3. 
I am new to this tool and I am evaluating for use intensively, I am following the installation steps Appcelerator Studio and have successfully run a sample application in a typical emulator (AVD).

After installing Genymotion and associate option in Windows / Preferences (Studio / Platforms / Android) unconfiguring and get the message [Android SDK Home] No Android SDKs ... d under the specified SDK location.

There is a problem when Genymotion is integrated into the latest version of Appcelerator Studio.

Your help please.
fields.summary: Message [Android SDK Home] No Android SDKs ... d under the specified SDK location.

comments.body: Hello, Make sure you have all the latest SDK tools installed in your Android SDK manager. Also, Can you run "appc info" and provide the log?
